text: Which of the following statements is/are TRUE? (@) Any language construct that can be defined with a regular expression can also be defined with a context-free grammar. (b) Any language construct that can be defined with a context-free grammar can also be defined with a regular expression. (Â¢) An LL (1) parser can be created for any context-free grammar. (d) LR parsing techniques are strictly more powerful than LL parsing techniques.
